com.mapbox.api.directions.v5.models

Class RouteOptions.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.api.directions.v5.models.RouteOptions.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    RouteOptions

    public abstract static class RouteOptions.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    This builder can be used to set the values describing the RouteOptions.
    Since:
    3.0.0

      Builder()

      Whether the alternatives value was set to true or not.

      The annotation which were used during the request process.

      Whether or not the request had banner instructions set to true or not.
      abstract RouteOptions.Builder baseUrl(java.lang.String baseUrl)
      The base URL that was used during the request time and resulted in this responses result.

      The bearing values the user used for the original request which resulted in this response.

      The language for instructions to be in when the response is given.

      The directions profile that was used during the request time and resulted in this responses result.

      The radiuses in string format that were used during the original request.

      A universally unique identifier (UUID) for identifying and executing a similar specific route in the future.

      The user value that was used during the request.

      Whether or not the request had voice instructions set to true or not.
      abstract RouteOptions.Builder voiceUnits(java.lang.String voiceUnits)
      Whether or not the units used inside the voice instruction's string are in imperial or metric.

      • coordinates

        public abstract RouteOptions.Builder coordinates(@NonNull
                                                 java.util.List<com.mapbox.geojson.Point> coordinates)
        The coordinates used for the routes origin, destination, and optionally, waypoints. Note that these coordinates are different than the direction responses DirectionsWaypoints in that these are the non-snapped coordinates.
        Parameters:
        coordinates - a list of Points which represent the route origin, destination, and optionally, waypoints
        Returns:
        this builder for chaining options together
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • alternatives

        public abstract RouteOptions.Builder alternatives(@Nullable
                                                  java.lang.Boolean alternatives)
        Whether the alternatives value was set to true or not.
        Parameters:
        alternatives - true if the request contained additional route request, otherwise false
        Returns:
        this builder for chaining options together
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • language

        public abstract RouteOptions.Builder language(java.lang.String language)
        The language for instructions to be in when the response is given.
        Parameters:
        language - a string with the language which was requested in the url
        Returns:
        this builder for chaining options together
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • radiuses

        public abstract RouteOptions.Builder radiuses(java.lang.String radiuses)
        The radiuses in string format that were used during the original request.
        Parameters:
        radiuses - radiuses values separated by comma
        Returns:
        this builder for chaining options together
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • bearings

        public abstract RouteOptions.Builder bearings(java.lang.String bearings)
        The bearing values the user used for the original request which resulted in this response. It is best to recalculate these values since they are probably outdated already.
        Parameters:
        bearings - number values representing the bearings separated by commas
        Returns:
        this builder for chaining options together
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • continueStraight

        public abstract RouteOptions.Builder continueStraight(java.lang.Boolean continueStraight)
        Whether the original request wanted continueStraight enabled or not.
        Parameters:
        continueStraight - true if you'd like the user to continue straight from the starting point
        Returns:
        this builder for chaining options together
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • annotations

        public abstract RouteOptions.Builder annotations(java.lang.String annotations)
        The annotation which were used during the request process.
        Parameters:
        annotations - in string format and separated by commas if more than one annotation was requested
        Returns:
        this builder for chaining options together
        Since:
        3.0.0

        public abstract RouteOptions.Builder voiceInstructions(java.lang.Boolean voiceInstructions)

        this builder for chaining options together
